casebody.data:
SUNBELT RENTALS
v.
EQUIPMENT, et al. No. 647P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. Paul M. Navarro, Charlotte, for Head & Engquist Equipment, et al. William L. Rikard, Jr., Charlotte, for Sunbelt Rentals, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of November 2005 by Defendants (Equipment, Hepler, Kline, Quine, Christenson and Pearsall) to Dismiss Petition:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of January 2006."
